title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 61-2.6 - Pyrotechnician examining board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 61-2.6 - Pyrotechnician examining board

State Regulations

The commissioner shall appoint an examining board, which
shall consist of at least three members. At least one member of such board
shall be a certified pyrotechnician and at least one other member of such board
shall be a representative of a company that conducts pyrotechnics or fireworks
shows. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
61-2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
